name: Microsoft Graphics Component权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-02131）
product: ["Microsoft Windows Server 2019", "Microsoft Window 11 22H2", "Microsoft Window 11 21H2", "Microsoft Window 10", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022 23H2", "Microsoft Window 11 1809", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022 22H2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022 24H2"]
description: Microsoft Graphics Component是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的图形驱动组件。Microsoft Graphics Component存在安全漏洞。攻击者可利用该漏洞提升权限。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-21382
patch: Microsoft Graphics Component权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-02131）的补丁
